content: The "you know what you have to do" quote implies that the thing tormenting Aylen is aware of her deepest fears and desires and is manipulating her into doing something she may not want to do. It could imply that Aylen has to make a difficult decision or take a drastic action in order for the torment to end. The quote could also imply that the thing is aware of something that Aylen is not and is trying to lead her to discover it. Overall, the quote creates a sense of manipulation and control, making Aylen question her own agency and decisions.
